tool.name: Blast report comparison
tool.help:
Usage: main.py [options] Neccessary to provide are the two tabular BLAST files old (-o) and new (-n)
Options: -h, --help show this help message and exit -o OLD_BLAST, --old=OLD_BLAST the older tabular BLAST file (24 columns) -n NEW_BLAST, --new=NEW_BLAST the newer BLAST file -t TOP, --top=TOP specify when only the top X (integer value) hits for each query are of interest -v, --verbose print everything -q, --quiet stay quiet -s SAVE_OUTPUT, --save=SAVE_OUTPUT file where the output is saved -p OUTPUT_PATH, --put=OUTPUT_PATH the path where the saved output and/or exported hit files are stored -l, --longOutput enable long names in the output -a, --adaptive only display those hit classes, that have elements -A, --notAdaptive display all elements -e EMAIL, --email=EMAIL email address of the user to send him/her notice of excess use -x EXPORT, --export=EXPORT export specified hit categories (Example: "-x new,old_all,suppressed", Categories: "equal, similar, live, replaced, suppressed, new, strange, all_old and all_new)"
